# Negative Binomial

> Negative binomial distribution.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var negativeBinomial = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dist/negativeBinomial' );
```

#### negativeBinomial

Negative binomial distribution.

``` javascript
var dist = negativeBinomial;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
